properties.script:
import json
sshstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J4PFDRB20e8isBtffu8M8WzqfkUecI$'
snmpstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50J8LTZ7X82N8cfRRVNuN5LmSdOdMUc5$'
pingstatus = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U50JCTJ62X47l4qENMJqtjVaohRtqmrm5$'
sshstatus = {'Pass' if sshstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'}
pingstatus = {'Pass' if pingstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'}
snmpstatus = {'Pass' if snmpstatus == "True"  else 'Fail'}
event_id = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2WNVGIFP6aRjRs4IB5PgljyV7XUlMr$'

connectivity_result = f"Connectivity Test Results:\nSSH - {sshstatus}\nSNMP - {snmpstatus}\nICMP - {pingstatus}\nEvent ID - {event_id}"
max_check_counter = '$workflow.definition_workflow_01U4SNYKLCMDG70sw8a5czlJ2F30S9tkIkI.local.variable_workflow_01U4YWYC3P2023Gf3aGeLKsDkdJPilpTcf4$'
customer = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J48UFITC56oUtjQMEvh6Dbtxkwx7vdB$'
device_name = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J32GQ7KRP5oKHUhjMHhUbYd38AcM8SF$'
incident_number = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J2GZRBUXQ0NV384mVMop7xvM5kQnnWZ$'
event_message = '$activity.definition_activity_01U4SNYSHLVK60nOKy4kwhqPw54o5ZefdoV.output.variable_workflow_01T8J5AW9TZ8B3smDvtFSz2OUPWibgZcQvh$'
current_status = 'This high priority ticket has exceeded the maximum reachability checks. Escalating to Engineer.'
next_steps = f'VE will continue to enrich this ticket. It will continue to perform connectivity test every 5 minutes up to {max_check_counter} times. It will only make internal Notes with its findings and will not change ownership or state.'

work_notes = f'Hello {customer},\r\n\r\nDevice: {device_name}\r\nAlarm: {event_message}\r\nTicket Number: {incident_number}\r\n\r\nCurrent Status: {current_status}\r\n\r\nNext Steps: {next_steps}\r\n\r\nThank you,\r\nVirtual Engineer'

connectivity_result = json.dumps(connectivity_result)
work_notes = json.dumps(work_notes)
